(Kolar Gold Fields) is a town in the

There are regular buses from Bangalore (nearest airport) as well as a train link.
KGF is connected to Bangalore via Kolar (NH7 runs from Kolar to Bangalore) by 
a state highway as well making it a possible drive of about three hours.

One can also take buses from Bangarapet (approximately 15km)
(which is a major junction on the Bangalore to Chennai train route).

The old mining gold mining rigs are worth seeing.

Many old British bungalows.

One very beautiful church dating to British times
